quest.name: Beat of the Drum
journal:
Seigetsu the Enlightened has an idea to enliven the festival even further.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

You have spoken with the Namazu artisan.
Deliver the requested supplies to Seigetsu the Enlightened.
objectives: Synthesize [Error]Deliver [Error] to Seigetsu the EnlightenedMine [Error] to the south of Chakha ZohGather [Error] in the south of Chakha ZohCatch [Error] in the upper Yat Khaal.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: According to that most puissant publication, The Chrysanthemum and the Dango, music has always been an indispensable part of festivals. And if our celebration is to beat with the requisite celebratory rhythm, then we must perforce acquire ourselves the necessary instruments.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Simply purchasing instruments would, however, cheapen the spirit of the event. In my literature-enriched opinion, the sound of drums crafted from locally sourced materials will best resonate with the souls of our steppe-dwelling ancestors.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: I have volunteered Gyoshin to assemble our music-making paraphernalia, but we await integral parts and pieces from one of our apprentice artisans. Would you please find him over near Chakha Zoh, and expedite the crafting process?

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03117
dialogue.text: Ah, you're a clever one with your fins, yes, yes? I've been putting together bits and pieces for our festival instruments, and just realized I was missing a piece here and a bit there.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03117
dialogue.text: Could you do me a favor, and hammer out a batch of pins for securing drum skins? My crate here should have everything you need.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03117
dialogue.text: Could you do me a favor, and shape some leather into drum skins? My crate here should have everything you need.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03117
dialogue.text: Could you do me a favor, and mix up some lacquer for coating drum shells? My crate here should have everything you need.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03117
dialogue.text: Could you do me a favor, and pick me out a pair of nice flat stones for tanning drum skins? Two would be plenty! More than enough. I think I saw some likely candidates to the south of here...

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03117
dialogue.text: Could you do me a favor, and pick me a basket or two of tea leaves for tanning drum skins? Yes, yes, two would be plenty! More than enough. I think I saw some tea plants to the south of here...

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03117
dialogue.text: Could you do me a favor, and get your fins on a leatherscale? Seigetsu is convinced that if we stretch out the fish's skin and clamp it down, it should make a satisfying percussive boom! Try your rod in the waters of the upper Yat Khaal─a little salmon roe on the hook should do the trick.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03117
dialogue.text: Ah, once you've taken care of my little favor, you can deliver it straight to Seigetsu. Many, many thanks in advance!

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03117
dialogue.text: Have you fumbled my favor? If you want to try again, there's more than enough materials in my crate! ...Please, please try again.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03117
dialogue.text: Have you fumbled my favor? If you want to try again, there's more than enough materials in my crate! ...Please, please try again.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03117
dialogue.text: Have you fumbled my favor? If you want to try again, there's more than enough materials in my crate! ...Please, please try again.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03117
dialogue.text: Are you having trouble fulfilling my favor? Look to the south of here─that's the opposite of north.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03117
dialogue.text: Are you having trouble fulfilling my favor? Look to the south of here─that's the opposite of north.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03117
dialogue.text: Are you having trouble fulfilling my favor? Try casting your line in the waters of the upper Yat Khaat. If you find yourself in the lower Yat Khaat, you've gone too far. Much, much too far.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03117
dialogue.text: You can deliver the goods directly to Seigetsu himself. I'll be along with the rest once I'm finished here. Slippery little beasts...

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Are we to see a complete delivery of drum parts today? Or was our neophyte artisan too busy splashing his fins in the stream?

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Ah, this is exactly the sort of crafting expertise I anticipated. It would seem I was justified in enlisting your assistance.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Ah, this is exactly the sort of geological expertise I anticipated. It would seem I was justified in enlisting your assistance.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Ah, this is exactly the sort of botanical expertise I anticipated. It would seem I was justified in enlisting your assistance.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Ah, this is exactly the sort of piscatological expertise I anticipated. It would seem I was justified in enlisting your assistance.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: The lively beat of our grand festival will echo ever more loudly across the steppe now that our number of drums is set to multiply.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Our celebrations have begun to reverberate with such ear-shattering volume, in fact, that I can scarce concentrate on my reading...

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: But such is the price of progress─whensoever we shed light upon the walls of civilization, we cannot help but create pools of shadow...
